subject: Action Required: Response Needed for Policy Violation Notice
description_text:
Request for Response Regarding Policy Violation Notice 
Hello Simsonn,
We previously sent you a notice regarding your page Simsonn for a copyright policy violation. However, we have not yet received any response from you.
To avoid the risk of permanent suspension of your account or page, please respond and resolve the violation within 24 hours of receiving this email.

Violation Details 
Page: Simsonn

Use of copyrighted content (images, videos, audio) without proper authorization.
Creating content that may cause confusion with another brand.
Copying or sharing unauthorized content.
Submit an Appeal 

If you believe this notice was sent in error, please submit an appeal for our review. Failure to respond within the given timeframe may result in account deactivation in accordance with our policies.
We look forward to your prompt response.


Sincerely,
JenaSupport Team
